archiefmat.titel: Brieven van en aan Gerard Jacob Sprenger tijdens zijn reis naar West-Indië
archiefmat.titel_eng: Letters from and to Gerard Jacob Sprenger written during his voyage to the West Indies
archiefmat.scope: Contains mainly letters from relatives at home, but also a few letters from G.J. Sprenger during his stay in Surname and Demerara. In his letters Sprenger also reports on the state of plantations that apparently are owned by the family. In the letters from home reactions can be found on these reports. The file also contains information on social life in the colonies (parties; invitation cards.)
